summary: Improves all weapon speed making combat much smoother and gets rid of all those times when you click and nothing happens. The combat is increased just enough to be a little more realistic less laggy.
descriptionHtml:
Every weapon set in the game has been modified to be faster. Every thing still runs perfect and smooth and does not lower A.I. in any way shape or form. Fighting will indeed be faster by a little so beginner players may have a harder time with this mod, but it is definitely worth having. No more button mashing to no affect. Unless you are clicking at an unreasonable speed that is. I think everyone will appreciate this mod and I will try to get some video for you guys soon. Please comment and rate. And if I skipped a weapon that you notice is too slow compared to everything else, please let me know. Available on Steam Workshop.

Below it a link that will show you how to get any modded weapons that you have up to speed with this mod. Sorry for the video's crappy qualities. I only spent a couple min. on it. 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y3zZR4wLG4s&feature=youtu.be


Final Note: 
Hello Everyone,
I am so sorry to have only just come back to look over how my mod is doing and that it has taken me so long to get back to you. It is with a heavy heart I am forced to inform everyone that as it is now, I no longer have much time on my hands for modding as I am approaching my 18th year, and go figure; life is full of craziness in the real world. This means strictly that I will no longer be developing anymore additions to this or any other mod I have developed. If anyone would like to do the community a solid favor, I welcome anyone to take on orders for these newer weapon mods, and post links in the comments for any faster combat additions, you would like to create. For simplicity and convenience for the community I recommend posting such links in this specific format. 

Title: Faster Combat/ Weapon mod name 
Link: www.http:/...... 

Thanks again for all the support guys!
author: monkeybladea
